Package etomica.paracetamol

Class ConfigurationOrthorhombicLattice

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.paracetamol.ConfigurationOrthorhombicLattice
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Configuration, java.io.Serializable

    public class ConfigurationOrthorhombicLattice
extends java.lang.Object
implements Configuration, java.io.Serializable
    Constructs configuration that has the molecules placed on the sites of a lattice. Molecules are placed sequentially on the sites of the lattice in an order specified by an index iterator set at construction.

    Iteration over the indexes yields integer arrays, and with each iteration the array is passed to the site method of the lattice which returns the position for placement of the next molecule. Each array index is iterated to a maximum value determined by the number of molecules to be placed, the dimensions of the box in which they are placed, and the lattice constants of the lattice.

    An instance of this class may be configured to place atoms such that they uniformly fill the volume of the box. It will attempt this by scaling the lattice constants of the configuration in an appropriate way. Success in getting a good spatial distribution may vary.

    An instance can also be configured to remember the indices used to get lattice position for each molecule that is placed. This can be useful if it is desired to associate each molecule with a lattice site.

    See Also:

      • getLatticeMemento

        public SpaceLattice getLatticeMemento​()
        Returns a lattice with positions the same as those used in the most recent use of initializeCoordinates. Includes any scaling or translation applied to fill the space, and thus will not necessarily be the same positions as specified by the lattice given at construction.

      • isRescalingToFitVolume

      • setRescalingToFitVolume

        public void setRescalingToFitVolume​(boolean resizeLatticeToFitVolume)
        Sets the resizeLatticeToFitVolume flag, which if true indicates that the primitive vectors should be resized to fit the dimensions of the box. Default is true.
        Parameters:
        resizeLatticeToFitVolume - The resizeLatticeToFitVolume to set
